001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus;
002
003import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.NotificationMessage;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.MessageProps;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
009import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.AlarmStatusRequest;
010
011import java.math.BigInteger;
012import java.util.HashSet;
013import java.util.Set;
014import java.util.TreeSet;
015
016/**
017 * Response message for {@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.AlarmStatusRequest}, opCode 71, size 8
018 *
019 * <br>
020 *
021 * 
022 * <table border='1'>
023 * <caption>Message properties:</caption>
024 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>opCode</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>71</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
025 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>size</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>8</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
026 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>type</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType#RESPONSE}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
027 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>request</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.AlarmStatusRequest}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
028 * </table>
029 */
030@MessageProps(
031        opCode=71,
032        size=8,
033        type=MessageType.RESPONSE,
034        request= AlarmStatusRequest.class
035)
036public class AlarmStatusResponse extends NotificationMessage {
037    private BigInteger intMap;
038
039    // private val unused, but placed to force java tostring to include the formatted alerts set
040    private Set<AlarmResponseType> alarms;
041
042    public AlarmStatusResponse() {}
043
044    public AlarmStatusResponse(BigInteger intMap) {
045        this.cargo = buildCargo(intMap);
046        parse(cargo);
047    }
048
049    private static byte[] buildCargo(BigInteger byte0uint64) {
050        return Bytes.toUint64(byte0uint64.longValue());
051    }
052
053    public void parse(byte[] raw) {
054        Validate.isTrue(raw.length == props().size());
055        intMap = Bytes.readUint64(raw, 0);
056        cargo = raw;
057        alarms = getAlarms();
058    }
059
060    public BigInteger getIntMap() {
061        return intMap;
062    }
063
064    @Override
065    public int size() {
066        return alarms==null ? 0 : alarms.size();
067    }
068
069    public enum AlarmResponseType {
070        CARTRIDGE_ALARM(0),
071        CARTRIDGE_ALARM2(1),
072        OCCLUSION_ALARM(2, "An occlusion has occurred. Please check your pump site and tubing and restart insulin delivery."),
073        PUMP_RESET_ALARM(3, "The pump was reset. IOB has been reset to 0 and CGM may need to be re-activated."),
074        DEFAULT_ALARM_4(4),
075        CARTRIDGE_ALARM3(5),
076        CARTRIDGE_ALARM4(6),
077        AUTO_OFF_ALARM(7, "Pump will stop delivering insulin automatically soon because no user activity has occurred and the auto-off setting is enabled."),
078        EMPTY_CARTRIDGE_ALARM(8, "Cartridge is out of insulin and insulin delivery cannot occur. Please fill a new cartridge."),
079        CARTRIDGE_ALARM5(9),
080        TEMPERATURE_ALARM(10),
081        TEMPERATURE_ALARM2(11),
082        BATTERY_SHUTDOWN_ALARM(12, "Pump battery level is critically low and the device will shut down. Please charge pump immediately."),
083        DEFAULT_ALARM_13(13),
084        INVALID_DATE_ALARM(14),
085        TEMPERATURE_ALARM3(15),
086        CARTRIDGE_ALARM6(16),
087        DEFAULT_ALARM_17(17),
088        RESUME_PUMP_ALARM(18, "Insulin delivery is currently off. Please restart insulin delivery soon."),
089        DEFAULT_ALARM_19(19),
090        CARTRIDGE_ALARM7(20),
091        ALTITUDE_ALARM(21),
092        STUCK_BUTTON_ALARM(22),
093        RESUME_PUMP_ALARM2(23, "Insulin delivery is currently off. Please restart insulin delivery soon."),
094        ATMOSPHERIC_PRESSURE_OUT_OF_RANGE_ALARM(24),
095        CARTRIDGE_REMOVED_ALARM(25, "The cartridge was removed from the pump. Please fill a new cartridge."),
096        OCCLUSION_ALARM2(26, "An occlusion has occurred. Please check your pump site and tubing and restart insulin delivery."),
097        DEFAULT_ALARM_27(27),
098        DEFAULT_ALARM_28(28),
099        CARTRIDGE_ALARM10(29),
100        CARTRIDGE_ALARM11(30),
101        CARTRIDGE_ALARM12(31),
102        DEFAULT_ALARM_32(32),
103        DEFAULT_ALARM_33(33),
104        DEFAULT_ALARM_34(34),
105        DEFAULT_ALARM_35(35),
106        DEFAULT_ALARM_36(36),
107        DEFAULT_ALARM_37(37),
108        DEFAULT_ALARM_38(38),
109        DEFAULT_ALARM_39(39),
110        DEFAULT_ALARM_40(40),
111        DEFAULT_ALARM_41(41),
112        DEFAULT_ALARM_42(42),
113        DEFAULT_ALARM_43(43),
114        DEFAULT_ALARM_44(44),
115        DEFAULT_ALARM_45(45),
116        DEFAULT_ALARM_46(46),
117        DEFAULT_ALARM_47(47),
118        DEFAULT_ALARM_48(48),
119        DEFAULT_ALARM_49(49),
120        DEFAULT_ALARM_50(50),
121        DEFAULT_ALARM_51(51),
122        DEFAULT_ALARM_52(52),
123        DEFAULT_ALARM_53(53),
124        DEFAULT_ALARM_54(54),
125        DEFAULT_ALARM_55(55),
126        DEFAULT_ALARM_56(56),
127        DEFAULT_ALARM_57(57),
128        DEFAULT_ALARM_58(58),
129        DEFAULT_ALARM_59(59),
130        DEFAULT_ALARM_60(60),
131        DEFAULT_ALARM_61(61),
132        DEFAULT_ALARM_62(62),
133        DEFAULT_ALARM_63(63)
134
135        ;
136
137        private final int bitmask;
138        private final String description;
139        AlarmResponseType(int bitmask) {
140            this.bitmask = bitmask;
141            this.description = null;
142        }
143        AlarmResponseType(int bitmask, String description) {
144            this.bitmask = bitmask;
145            this.description = description;
146        }
147
148        public int bitmask() {
149            return bitmask;
150        }
151        public String getDescription() {
152            return description;
153        }
154
155        public static BigInteger toBitmask(AlarmResponseType ...types) {
156            BigInteger ret = BigInteger.ZERO;
157            for (AlarmResponseType type : types) {
158                ret = ret.setBit(type.bitmask());
159            }
160
161            return ret;
162        }
163
164        public static Set<AlarmResponseType> fromBitmask(BigInteger intMap) {
165            Set<AlarmResponseType> current = new TreeSet<>();
166            for (AlarmResponseType type : AlarmResponseType.values()) {
167                if (intMap.testBit(type.bitmask())) {
168                    current.add(type);
169                }
170            }
171
172            return current;
173        }
174
175        public static AlarmResponseType fromSingularId(long id) {
176            for (AlarmResponseType type : AlarmResponseType.values()) {
177                if (id == type.bitmask()) {
178                    return type;
179                }
180            }
181            return null;
182        }
183
184        public String toString() {
185            return name();
186        }
187    }
188
189    public Set<AlarmResponseType> getAlarms() {
190        return AlarmResponseType.fromBitmask(getIntMap());
191    }
192}
